Detailed Description

This class handles beam parameters which have been written by hand into the database.

It is to be used if beam parameters are either not available at all or if the analysis of the r/o has revealed some odds. This class might evolve with time, for the time being it constains only the beam energy.

Author:
R. Pöschl LAL
Date:
Oct 2007
